title: Calories in a Tablespoon of Sugar
meta_description: Discover calories in tablespoon of sugar, including carbs, sugars, and full nutrition breakdown per serving with easy tweaks and FAQs.
h1: Calories in a Tablespoon of Sugar
assumptions: Granulated white sugar, level tablespoon (~12 g); no additives.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, density, brand, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of granulated sugar contains about 49 kcal, all from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one tablespoon of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 49 kcal for a level tablespoon of granulated sugar.
Yes, nearly 100% carbohydrates, with 12.6 g carbs and sugars per tablespoon.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a tablespoon?
faqs.a: About 12.6 g of sugar, equivalent to 3 teaspoons.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have more calories than white?
faqs.a: Slightly—around 52 kcal per tablespoon due to molasses content.

faqs.q: Are there any nutrients besides calories in sugar?
faqs.a: Minimal; 0 g protein, fat, fiber, sodium, or cholesterol—pure energy source.
